ygData.subject: Re: Play Time?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve got 65 or so /played days, I hit L50 just before 60 days played. I didn t rush Harmonic along, and have played a few classes up to L10 to see how the
ygData.messageBody:
> Alright, I've been reading this list for a long time and been playing EQ
> since about three weeks after release. It simply blows my mind that anyone
> could have a 50th Level character, let alone more than one! I've got three
> characters, each on a different server:

I've got 65 or so /played days, I hit L50 just before 60 days played.
I didn't rush Harmonic along, and have played a few classes up to L10
to see how the feel. Still, I stick with the bard. I've got a L20
druid that I play more and more these days, however.

I used to hit the PoH every night, but now since Verant has changed
the plane, no one even bothers going up there.

So now the PoH joins the other planes as weekend only events. Now
during the week, I hardly play my bard.

I work 9am to 6pm ET. I have a kitten and a girlfriend to feed.
/chuckle I usually play for about 4-5 hours a night. Eat dinner
at the keyboard, horrible dinners at that. Need to start eating
better. After EQ last night for example, I finished the Hobbitt
and started on the Fellowship of the Ring, while my girlfriend
was reading Harry Potter. Weekends, she works all day, so I get
to bust my neck sitting at the computer all day.

Not as hardcore as some people by far, and I still have a little
life outside EQ left =)

Harmonic.
